attributes.additional_details: Revert Islington to what it was, make this Borough great again!
attributes.background: Our government is closing all roads in Islington forcing you to use only main roads. Its a disgusting money making scheme. Its actually horrible to think our government 1) Want to use us a money generating scheme 2) Creating a lot of negatives in causing main road traffic

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

We also can't accept petitions calling for an action for which the UK Government or Parliament are not responsible.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
